name: YuNo's Cataclysm: Revitalized
description:
<color_red>Adds a variety of things into the Cataclysm, NPCs, Sci-Fi stuff, Enemies, Magic, and more.</color> 
<color_light_green>This is a mod that is balanced around vanilla, while still adding many things that are far from vanilla. 
<color_magenta>This version is from 3/12/2024</color>
